  • Help

    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Animal
    The Animal enum represents different types of animals in the game.
    AnimalToken
    Represents an animal token in the game, encapsulating an Animal type.
    BearScoring
    Represents the scoring logic for the Bear animal in the game.
    Board
    The Board class represents the game board for a player.
    BuzzardScoring
    Represents the scoring logic for the Buzzard animal in the game.
    CardType
    Represents the common scoring card types associated with all animals in the game.
    ControllerGraphic
    A record representing the graphical controller for the game.
    ControllerTerminal
    A record representing the terminal controller for the game.
    ElkScoring
    Represents the scoring logic for the Elk animal in the game.
    FaunaScoring
    The `FaunaScoring` class implements the `ScoringStrategy` for scoring animals based on their assigned cards.
    FoxScoring
    Represents the scoring logic for the FOx animal in the game.
    Game
    The main class representing the Cascadia game.
    GameInterface
    Interface representing the essential operations of a game controller, used for terminal and graphical implementations.
    GameManager
    The GameManager class manages the logic and flow of the Cascadia game.
    GameSuccess
    Represents the achievements of a player in a regular game session.
    GameView
    The `GameView` interface defines methods for rendering game elements on the screen, interacting with the graphical interface, and managing visual feedback for the player.
    Habitat
    The Habitat enum represents different types of habitats in the game.
    HabitatAnalyzer
    An HabitatAnalyzer interface that provides methods for analyzing habitats on a game board.
    HexagoHabitatAnalyzer
    The HexagoHabitatAnalyzer class implements the HabitatAnalyzer interface and provides functionality for analyzing habitats on a hexagonal board.
    HexagoTile
    Represents a hexagonal tile in the game board.
    HexagoView
    Represents the view for hexagonal tiles and manages the drawing of the game board, shelf, and graphical elements on the screen for hexagonal based boards.
    ImageLoader
    The ImageLoader class deals with retrieving and storing multiple images in a cache.
    Player
    The Player class represents a player in the game.
    Position
    The Position record represents a position with x and y coordinates.
    SalmonScoring
    Represents the scoring logic for the Salmon animal in the game.
    ScenarioSuccess
    Represents the scenarios and their associated success conditions for a player.
    Score
    The Score class manages the calculation of points for animals, habitats, and bonuses.
    ScoringCard
    A sealed interface for scoring cards.
    ScoringStrategy
    A sealed interface for defining different scoring strategies.
    Shelf
    The Shelf class represents a storage system for tiles and animal tokens.
    SquareHabitatAnalyzer
    Implementation of HabitatAnalyzer for square tiles board This class provides methods to analyze habitats and their adjacency on square boards.
    SquareTile
    Represents a square tile in the Cascadia game.
    SquareView
    Represents the view for square tiles and manages the drawing of the game board, shelf, and graphical elements on the screen for square-based boards.
    SuccessManager
    The SuccessManager interface defines methods for managing and checking player achievements in different game scenarios.
    SuccessUtils
    a class providing helper methods to evaluate player success conditions.
    Tile
    Represents a tile in the game board.
    TileType
    Represents the two types of tiles: Hexagonal and Square.
    VariantScoring
    The VariantScoring class calculates the score of a specific variant for a given animal.
    ViewUtils
    Utility class for rendering images and tokens in the Cascadia game.
